verbose_text: XREF_BIBR previously used in ovo electroporation to insert into the genome of presomitic mesoderm cells both a construct that constitutively expresses the reverse (' Tet-on ') tetracycline transactivator protein variant rtTA2 S M2, and a tetracycline inducible NotchDeltaE construct, in which a single tetracycline response element controls the bidirectional transcription of NotchDeltaE and EGFP, whose expression was activated at somite stages by doxycycline injection.
